column4: i accidently removed a directory in jetty and now when i try to uninstall/reinstall with apt-get, it says there is 1 package not fully installed or removed... and i get errors when installing/uninstalling... tried purging, autoremove, cleaning... not having any luck :(
Try creating the empty directory where the old one was?
i did that too.. still no luck
ah i think i finally got it :)
